long_description: If you're off to raft a river or hike the desert, wear the Marmot Marissa Shirt and enjoy quick-drying comfort and outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection. Lightweight 100% nylon fabric wicks moisture and dries fast and is tough enough to withstand abrasion. Durable flatlock seams have contrast stitching on the interior. Plaid design excels at hiding the dust and dirt of travel and hiking. Darts give the Marmot Marissa Shirt a tailored fit. Also features a shirttail hem, button-tabs to hold rolled-up sleeves and chest pockets with button closure.
short_description: If you're off to raft a river or hike the desert, wear the Marmot Marissa Shirt and enjoy quick-drying comfort and outstanding UPF 50+ sun protection.
